title: Free arial font needed
content:
Hi

Where can I find ariel rounded outline font or a similar outline font?
author: independent

comments.content: [2002 honest fonts has exactly the kind of fonts you want.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017160512/http:/bit.ly/2v47lR)

Fonts are cheap and easy to find. Go and buy it.
